content:
Has FMG reviewed https://confluence.hl7.org/display/FHIR/2022-01+Using+End-to-End+Encryption+%28E2EE%29+with+QuestionnaireResponse ? It seems tied to a specific vendor product with custom JSON structures tacked onto FHIR Questionnaires

image.png

I see @Lloyd McKenzie responded in #questionnaire to indicate he didn't think there would be support for a track like this, but it's now listed in Confluence.
I had talked to the author of the track and suggested that his objectives would best be met in the SDC and FAST tracks. @Sandra Vance, is this a track we can remove?

Lloyd McKenzie said:

I had talked to the author of the track and suggested that his objectives would best be met in the SDC and FAST tracks. Sandra Vance, is this a track we can remove?

Did you tell the track leads we're going to? I can reach out to the track leads to confirm and then remove. Thx!
I had said it was likely. I presumed you'd red flag it and bring it to the FMG :)
